lyric:
[00:39]No flask can keep it
[00:42]Bubble up and cut right through
[00:45]But you're someone I believe in
[00:49]You heat me like a filament
[00:53]Anytime you're in the room
[00:56]But you burned me and i'm smoking
[01:00]I just wanted you to watch me dissolve
[01:03]Slowly
[01:05]In a pool full of your love
[01:08]But i don't even know how the chemistry works
[01:15]When you're poolside
[01:17]Kicking in the dirt
[01:19]Kicking in the sand
[01:20]And stirring up trouble
[01:25]Can't find an exit
[01:27]I wander in a maze alone
[01:30]If i find you will you shock me?
[01:32]Left left and right right
[01:38]Pretty sure that i've been here before
[01:41]And it isn't what i wanted
[01:45]I just wanted you to watch me dissolve
[01:48]Slowly
[01:50]In a pool full of your love
[01:55]But i don't even know how the chemistry works
[02:00]When you're poolside
[02:03]Kicking in the dirt
[02:04]Kicking in the sand
[02:05]And stirring up trouble
[02:10]Your voice like an angel
[02:12]Been chain smoking all month long
[02:15]Like you're someone i believe in
[02:17]You held me but i'm volatile
[02:24]And never got my head screwed on
[02:27]Now i'm melting through the floor
[02:29]Am i only a lab rat?
[02:35]Someone you can test things on?
[02:38]Are you training for a new love?
[02:42]All in white, like you're an angel
[02:45]With the sun glimmering off your glass mask
[02:49]This isn't what i signed up for
[02:53]I just wanted you……
[03:04]I just wanted you……
[03:15]I just wanted you to watch me dissolve
[03:17]Slowly
[03:20]In a pool full of your love
[03:22]But i don't even know how the chemistry works
[03:30]When you're poolside
[03:32]Kicking in the dirt
[03:34]Kicking in the sand
[03:35]And stirring up trouble
[03:39]I just wanted you to watch me dissolve
[03:45]I just wanted you to watch me dissolve
[03:48]Slowly
[03:50]I just wanted you to watch me dissolve
[03:56]I just wanted you to watch me dissolve
[03:59]Slowly
tlyric:
[by:XXXLeebig]
[00:39]没有什么能够留下它
[00:42]沸腾之后势如破竹
[00:45]但你是我信任的人啊
[00:49]只要你在屋内
[00:53]就让我像灯丝一般发烫
[00:56]然而你却烧的我伤痕累累
[01:00]我只想要你看着我融化
[01:03]慢慢消逝
[01:05]在充满你爱意的水池中
[01:08]但我甚至不知道你和我之间起了什么化学反应
[01:15]当你站在泳池边
[01:17]踢几脚沙尘
[01:19]悠闲自得
[01:20]这使我躁动
[01:25]我却找不到出口
[01:27]独自在迷宫里游荡
[01:30]如果我找到你，你会惊艳到我吗
[01:32]左边，右边
[01:38]非常确定我曾在这
[01:41]这却不是我所求
[01:45]我只想要你看着我融化
[01:48]缓慢逝去
[01:50]在充满你爱意的水池中
[01:55]但我甚至不知道这其中的奥秘
[02:00]当你站在池子旁
[02:03]踢几脚沙石
[02:04]悠闲随意
[02:05]这使我内心骚动
[02:10]你的声音犹如天籁
[02:12]弥漫在我周围，将我捆绑
[02:15]就像你是我相信的人啊
[02:17]你拥我入怀我却变得不安
[02:24]你使我鬼迷心窍
[02:27]现在我化了一地
[02:29]难道我只是小白鼠吗？
[02:35]随意让你在我身上做实验？
[02:38]你已经在准备下一段恋情了吗？
[02:42]浑身浴白，你就像一个天使
[02:45]微光洒在你的水晶面具上
[02:49]这不是我所期望的
[02:53]我只想要你 ….
[03:04]我只想要你再 ….
[03:15]我只想你看着我融化
[03:17]慢慢地消失
[03:20]在充满你爱意的水池中
[03:22]但我甚至不知道这其中的奥秘
[03:30]当你站在水池边
[03:32]踢着沙石
[03:34]不太刻意
[03:35]却成为我的心病
[03:39]我只求你看着我融化
[03:45]我只求你看着我
[03:48]慢慢地消失
[03:50]我只求你看着我消融
[03:56]消融....
[03:59]慢慢地
